author: @saverna1
text: I save up for grad school courses through my University after spending time studying free content. It's a great way to network and build a formal portfolio along with building a formal foundation that is recognized internationally. Many courses cover memberships to professional publications and groups that would be out of a typical self study persons reach. 10 courses is a Masters degree and you can usually take your time to do a few certifications before rolling your experiences into a degree
